name: New York Life Capital Partners
overview:
New York Life Capital Partners LLC (NYLCAP) manages over $6.6 billion1 of private equity assets, including direct equity, direct mezzanine, and limited partnership investments. As an affiliate of New York Life Investment Management, NYLCAP manages alternative assets for New York Life Insurance Company, its affiliates and other institutional investors.

NYLCAP, together with its predecessor organizations, began investing in private equity partnerships in 1984 and has been an active, direct private equity investor since 1991.

NYLCAP’s partnership investment philosophy for the past 19 years has been to create a focused portfolio of key relationships with top-performing financial sponsors utilizing a “Core Partner” strategy.

NYLCAP’s Core Partner strategy is based on identifying top performing financial sponsors who have a demonstrated expertise within a target area of investing and a definable value-added approach to their portfolio companies. The Core Partner strategy involves a proactive and comprehensive review of a wide spectrum of general partners and has led to NYLCAP’s early identification of many leading private equity firms over the last 19 years. This type of strategy creates a high-quality, proprietary deal flow.
